title: sharding-scaling-ui fix details
body:
Fixes #4234 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- 1. Refresh the data scaling page after the service is configured. The service is not displayed
- 2. Entering data scaling for the first time is to report an error rather than pop-up the window for filling
- 3. Progress details page, progress will not be automatically updated, the window needs to be closed and reopened

title: add downloadRoot for frontend-maven-plugin
body: `frontend-maven-plugin` will download node and npm from `https://nodejs.org/dist` by default, this is very slow for china's network. we can use a mirror site(`http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/node/`) to speed up the build of ui-frontend module.
